MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnApplyTemplate() cil managed

summary.span: 在套用新的範本時，建置 的視覺化樹狀結構。

span.span: Builds the visual tree for the when a new template is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序 (例如重建配置傳遞) 呼叫 方法時，就會叫用此方法。This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnGotKeyboardFocus(class System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnGotKeyboardFocus (e As KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供 已路由事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會設定屬性`true`如，此標頭隸屬此標頭取得鍵盤焦點時。This method sets the property to `true` for the that this header belongs to when this header gets keyboard focus. 此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (屬性) 的事件資料。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供 已路由事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會嘗試向下鍵 索引標籤標頭上按下時，將焦點移索引標籤中的第一個元素。This method attempts to move the focus to the first element in the tab when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed on the tab header. 如果成功，它會將標示事件，如藉由設定處理屬性的事件資料至`true`。If successful, it marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnKeyTipAccessed(class System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipAccessedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnKeyTipAccessed (e As KeyTipAccessedEventArgs)

span.span: Contains data about the activation.

summary.span: 在存取 KeyTip 或快速鍵時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonDown(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonDown (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 通知在此標籤標題上的滑鼠左鍵按下事件。

span.span: Notifies the of a mouse left button down event on this tab header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會將標示事件，如藉由設定處理屬性的事件資料至`true`。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnRender(class System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext drawingContext) cil managed

param.name: drawingContext

span.span: The drawing instructions for a specific element.

param.span: 此內容會提供給配置系統。

span.span: This context is provided to the layout system.

summary.span: 參與由配置系統主導的呈現操作。

span.span: Participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system.

summary.span: 這個項目的呈現指令不會在叫用此方法時直接使用，而是會加以保留，以便稍後由配置和繪圖做非同步使用。

span.span: The rendering instructions for this element are not used directly when this method is invoked, and are instead preserved for later asynchronous use by layout and drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此覆寫呼叫基底方法，並接著確定會完全呈現之前和計算屬性。This override calls the base method, and then ensures that the is completely rendered before the and properties are calculated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設定其父系控制，而且會繼承由子控制項。This property is set on the parent control and is inherited by the child controls. 它用來存取上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷類別。It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the class. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
